mapper.update: UPDATE product_posting set today_deal = false, deal_id = null FROM product_posting pp JOIN deal_info di ON di.deal_id = pp.deal_id WHERE di.deal_status = '종료' AND di.deal_id = pp.deal_id AND di.deal_postid = pp.post_id AND (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM NOW() - di.deal_endtime))::INTEGER > 0;

UPDATE product_posting set today_deal = false FROM deal_info di WHERE di.deal_status = '종료' AND di.deal_id = deal_id AND di.deal_postid = post_id AND (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM NOW() - di.deal_endtime))::Integer > 0;
